```{r}
# fill jagged dataframe
cbind.fill<-function(...){
    nm <- list(...) 
    nm<-lapply(nm, as.matrix)
    n <- max(sapply(nm, nrow)) 
    do.call(cbind, lapply(nm, function (x) 
    rbind(x, matrix(, n-nrow(x), ncol(x))))) 
}

#Read the steep and cheap content and return as a dataframe
steep_and_cheap <- function(url){
  webpage <- read_html(url)
  
  page <- webpage %>%
    html_nodes("span")
  
  
 page_attrs <- page %>% 
   html_attrs()

  
  t_price <- page[which(t_spans == "ui-pl-pricing-low-price price-sale js-item-price-low qa-item-price-low")] %>% 
    html_text()
  
  t_pcnt <- page[which(t_spans == "ui-pl-percentage-off discount-sale qa-item-discount")] %>% 
    html_text()
  
  t_name <- page[which(page_attrs == "ui-pl-name-wrap" )] %>% 
    html_text()
  
  pro <- list(t_name, t_price, t_pcnt)
  
  
  protection <- data.frame(cbind.fill(t_name, t_price, t_pcnt))
  names(protection) <- c("name", "price", "percent")
  return(protection)
}

```


```{r}
url_shoes <- "https://www.steepandcheap.com/rock-climbing-shoes?sort=-discountpercent&p=brand%3AScarpa%7CBrand%3A100000327&nf=1"
```
